//    Author: LeWiz Communications, Inc.
//    Language: Verilog

//

//CTRL_MEMORY width is 32 bits in write transaction.
//
//mem_axi_awctrl[ 7: 0]		= 		not used
//mem_axi_awctrl[15: 8]		= 		axis_tlen       (in qwd, max is 255 x 8 = 2040 bytes, but packet max is 1500 bytes  )
//mem_axi_awctrl[18:30]		= 		not used
//mem_axi_awctrl[31:28]		= 		axis_tstrb      (same as byte enable of the last qwd, others are full qwd, range 1 - 8)





70000800	//pkt-1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000

30000a00	//pkt-2
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000

60000c00	//pkt-3
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000

20000700	//pkt-4
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000

70001f00	//pkt-5
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000

00000000
00000000
00000000
